2025-11-13JUSOther Than Statutory AuthorityAppointment of a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of YukonAppointment of the Honourable Amy D. Francis, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.N/A
subject: Appointment of a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon
precis: Appointment of the Honourable Amy D. Francis, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.
